room_title: Escape room "Mission: Bluelist" by Blue Ops Mission in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the operation Bluelist over the weekend and it is really fun - but its HARD. Granted, we had 6 adults and 3 kiddos under the age of 15, we definitely got stuck a few times. A word of advice: the goal is using 3 hints or less, but dont be afraid to use a hint or two early on. Get past a few locks and codes quickly because there will be ones that will be way more challenging.Ownership is really great, staff is all friendly and nice. This is a veteran owned company, that alone is why i will be back. We are going to get a group together to try another one.Thanks Blue Ops!

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Bluelist" by Blue Ops Mission in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our group came out for team-building exercise and had a really fun time! The room was a challenging puzzle, and we had an exciting time working together to solve it. Looking forward to going back for another room!

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Bluelist" by Blue Ops Mission in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It was an intriguing game! Our host was nice and accommodating! She gave clear instructions and helped us throughout the game with riddles!
